Section.name: About Sri R.K.M. Law College
Section.description: S.R.K.M. Law College is among the renowned institutes of its field in Andhra Pradesh and was established in 1991. It is located in Chittoor and it is affiliated to Sri Venkateswara University, Tirupati. The College offers three-year under graduate and five-year integrated course in the field of law. Sri R.K.M. Law College has gained the approval from Bar Council of India (BCI), New Delhi, in order to conduct the courses. The institution boasts of providing in-depth understanding of legal terms and law. Apart from imparting high quality legal education, S.R.K.M. Law College also conducts extracurricular activities and provides state-of-the-art facilities for the overall development of its students. This college provides law courses for undergraduates. It provides LL.B (3 years) and integrated LL.B (5 years).
